Let Google\'s location service and other apps scan for networks, even when WLAN is off

To improve location accuracy and for other purposes, Google and other apps may scan for nearby networks, even when WLAN is off. If you don\'t want this to happen, go to Advanced > Scanning always available.
Apps may scan for nearby networks, even when WLAN is off. If you don\'t want this to happen, go to Advanced > Scanning always available.

Default write disk has changed, must reboot now!

You can encrypt your accounts, settings, downloaded apps and their data, media, and other files. Once you encrypt your phone, you need to type a numeric PIN or password to decrypt it each time you power it on. You can\'t decrypt your phone except by performing a factory data reset, erasing all your data.\n\nEncryption takes several minutes or more. You must start with a charged battery and keep your phone plugged in until encryption is complete. If you interrupt the encryption process, you will lose some or all of your data.
The encryption operation is irreversible and if you interrupt it, you\'ll lose data. Encryption takes several minutes or more, during which the phone will restart several times.
You need to set a lock screen pattern, PIN or password before you can use credential storage.
"Quickly launch apps & unlock the screen when screen is off"
"XP recommended.Take the external but not the built-in memory card as U disk to copy the files. "
"No external memory card is detected, the built-in memory card doesn\'t support the U disk mode, so that it can\'t be used"
No lock screen PIN or password
You need to set a lock screen PIN or password before you can start encryption.
Require a numeric PIN or password to decrypt your phone each time you power it on
Pull down to show recent settings
Lets you transfer media files on Windows, or using Android File Transfer on Mac (see www.android.com/filetransfer)
Lets you transfer photos using camera software, and transfer any files on computers that don\'t support MTP

1，USB mass storage：phone as a U disk for file operation. 

 2，MTP：Phone as a U disk for file operation，operate file in phone at the same time. When computer OS is XP or below , it needs to install driver. 

 3，PTP：Use camera software to translate photos.When computer OS is XP or below , it needs to install driver. 

 4，USB debug：When connected , manage phone in computer with software such as LeHelper , 91 Helper and so on. 

 5，USB tethering：When connected , the computer can access internet through your phone. the U disk can not be installed when connecting.
Do not pop up next time?
If you uncheck this item, this window will not appear next time when you connect your phone to computer. You can come into this window by click system notification.
